title: V Rising Server Settings
description: Schema for both ServerHostSettings.json and ServerGameSettings.json

Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the server that shows up in server list

**Default**: `"V Rising Server"`

**Example**: `"My V Rising Server"`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_NAME`, `VR_SERVER_NAME`

**Command Line**: `-serverName`

Description.markdownDescription:
Short server description shown in details panel of server list when entry is selected. Also printed in chat when connecting to server

**Default**: `""`

**Example**: `"Role playing server. Reset every Monday. Be nice."`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_DESCRIPTION`

**Command Line**: `-description`

Port.markdownDescription:
UDP port for game traffic

**Default**: `9876`

**Example**: `27015`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_GAME_PORT`

**Command Line**: `-gamePort`

QueryPort.markdownDescription:
UDP port for Steam server list features

**Default**: `9877`

**Example**: `27016`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_QUERY_PORT`

**Command Line**: `-queryPort`

MaxConnectedUsers.markdownDescription:
Max number of concurrent players on server. Maximum technically supported is 128

**Default**: `40`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_MAX_USERS`

**Command Line**: `-maxUsers`

MaxConnectedAdmins.markdownDescription:
Max number of admins to allow connect even when server is full

**Default**: `4`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_MAX_ADMINS`

**Command Line**: `-maxAdmins`

ServerFps.markdownDescription:
Target FPS for server

**Default**: `30`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_FPS`, `VR_TARGET_FPS`

**Command Line**: `-fps`, `-targetFps`, `-serverFps`

SaveName.markdownDescription:
Name of save file/directory. Must be a valid directory name

**Default**: `"world1"`

**Example**: `"world23"`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_SAVE_NAME`

**Command Line**: `-saveName`

Password.markdownDescription:
Server password. Leave empty for no password

**Default**: `""`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_PASSWORD`

**Command Line**: `-password`

Secure.markdownDescription:
Enable VAC protection on server. VAC banned clients will not be able to connect

**Default**: `true`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_SECURE`

**Command Line**: `-secure`, `-enableSecure`, `-disableSecure`

ListOnSteam.markdownDescription:
Register on Steam list server

**Default**: `false`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_LIST_ON_STEAM`

**Command Line**: `-listOnSteam`

ListOnEOS.markdownDescription:
Register on EOS list server

**Default**: `false`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_LIST_ON_EOS`

**Command Line**: `-listOnEOS`

AutoSaveCount.markdownDescription:
Total number of Auto Saves to keep

**Default**: `20`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_SAVE_COUNT`

**Command Line**: `-saveCount`

HideIPAddress.markdownDescription:
When listing server on EOS server list, the IP address will not be shown/advertised. Players will connect via relay servers

**Example**: `false`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_HIDEIPADDRESS`, `VR_HIDE_IP_ADDRESS`

**Command Line**: `-hideIpAddress`

LowerFPSWhenEmpty.markdownDescription:
Run the server at a lower framerate target when no players are logged in

**Example**: `true`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_LOWER_FPS_WHEN_EMPTY`

**Command Line**: `-lowerFPSWhenEmpty`

LowerFPSWhenEmptyValue.markdownDescription:
Set the framerate target for when LowerFPSWhenEmpty is active

**Example**: `15`, `10`, `5`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_LOWER_FPS_WHEN_EMPTY_VALUE`

**Command Line**: `-lowerFPSWhenEmptyValue`

AutoSaveInterval.markdownDescription:
Interval in seconds between each auto save

**Default**: `120`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_SAVE_INTERVAL`

**Command Line**: `-saveInterval`

CompressSaveFiles.markdownDescription:
Whether save files should be compressed

**Default**: `true`

GameSettingsPreset.markdownDescription:
Load a ServerGameSettings preset from VRisingServer_Data/StreamingAssets/GameSettingPresets folder

**Default**: `""`

**Example**: `"StandardPvP"`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_PRESET`

**Command Line**: `-preset`

GameDifficultyPreset.markdownDescription:
Load a GameDifficulty preset from VRisingServer_Data/StreamingAssets/GameDifficultyPresets folder

**Default**: `""`

**Example**: `"Difficulty_Normal"`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_DIFFICULTY_PRESET`

**Command Line**: `-difficultyPreset`

AdminOnlyDebugEvents.markdownDescription:
Whether debug events are restricted to admins only

**Default**: `true`

DisableDebugEvents.markdownDescription:
Whether to disable debug events entirely

**Default**: `false`

Enabled.markdownDescription:
Whether to enable the server API

**Default**: `false`

Enable or disable Rcon functionality

**Default**: `false`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_RCON_ENABLED`

**Command Line**: `-rconEnabled`, `-enableRcon`, `-disableRcon`

Password.markdownDescription:
Password to access RCON

**Default**: `""`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_RCON_PASSWORD`

**Command Line**: `-rconPassword`

BindAddress.markdownDescription:
Binds RCON socket to specified address. Will override the global Address setting

**Example**: `"10.22.0.8"`

**Environment Variables**: `VR_RCON_BIND_ADDRESS`

**Command Line**: `-rconBindAddress`

GameDifficulty.markdownDescription: Sets the primary game difficulty (it's best not to change this from default as other server settings changed in this file will not be applied

GameModeType.markdownDescription:
Sets the primary game mode type:

- `PvE`: Player versus Environment - Defines basics for PvE Gamemode
- `PvP`: Player versus Player - Defines basics for PvP Gamemode

**Default**: `PvP`

CastleDamageMode.markdownDescription:
Controls when castles can be damaged:

- `Never`: Players may never deal damage to enemy castle structures
- `Always`: Players may always deal damage to enemy castle structures
- `TimeRestricted`: Players may only damage enemy castle structures during certain real-time frames

**Default**: `Always`

SiegeWeaponHealth.markdownDescription:
Changes siege golem health:

- `VeryLow`: 500 HP
- `Low`: 1000 HP
- `Normal`: 1500 HP
- `High`: 2000 HP
- `VeryHigh`: 2500 HP

**Default**: `Normal`

PlayerDamageMode.markdownDescription:
Controls when players can damage each other (Disabled in PvE):

- `Always`: Players can always deal damage to other players
- `TimeRestricted`: Players may only damage other players during certain real-time frames

**Default**: `Always`

CastleHeartDamageMode.markdownDescription:
How Castle Hearts can be captured/destroyed:

- `CanBeDestroyedOnlyWhenDecaying`: Players may only destroy hearts when in Decay
- `CanBeDestroyedByPlayers`: Players may destroy hearts using 'key' items
- `CanBeSeizedOrDestroyedByPlayers`: Players may destroy and seize control using 'key' items

**Default**: `CanBeDestroyedByPlayers`

PvPProtectionMode.markdownDescription:
Protection time for new players in PvP:

- `Disabled`: 0 seconds (no protection)
- `VeryShort`: 900 seconds (15 minutes)
- `Short`: 1800 seconds (30 minutes)
- `Medium`: 3600 seconds (1 hour)
- `Long`: 7200 seconds (2 hours)

**Default**: `Medium`

DeathContainerPermission.markdownDescription:
Controls who can loot your dropped items after death:

- `Anyone`: Everyone can loot the body
- `ClanMembers`: Only self and Clan members may loot the body
- `OnlySelf`: Only self may loot the body

**Default**: `Anyone`

RelicSpawnType.markdownDescription:
Controls soul shard drops from end game bosses:

- `Unique`: Soul shards are unique - only one of each type may exist at a time
- `Plentiful`: Soul shards are plentiful - a new one drops each time a boss is slain

**Default**: `Unique`

CanLootEnemyContainers.markdownDescription:
Whether players can loot containers belonging to other players not in their clan

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

BloodBoundEquipment.markdownDescription:
When enabled, most equipment will not be dropped upon death

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

TeleportBoundItems.markdownDescription:
When enabled, some items will prevent you from using waygates

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

BatBoundItems.markdownDescription:
Whether items will prevent using bat form

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

AllowGlobalChat.markdownDescription:
Allow players to write messages that all players on the server can read

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

AllWaypointsUnlocked.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **WARNING: DO NOT CHANGE** - can harm server!
Whether all Vampire Waygates start unlocked

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

FreeCastleRaid.markdownDescription:
Whether raiding an enemy player castle heart requires materials

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

FreeCastleClaim.markdownDescription:
Whether claiming castles requires resources

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

FreeCastleDestroy.markdownDescription:
Whether destroying castles requires resources

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

InactivityKillEnabled.markdownDescription:
Whether inactive players will be killed after a certain amount of time

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

DisableDisconnectedDeadEnabled.markdownDescription:
Whether dead characters persist in the world if the player is disconnected

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

AnnounceSiegeWeaponSpawn.markdownDescription:
Shows a system message in the chat when a Siege Golem is being summoned

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

ShowSiegeWeaponMapIcon.markdownDescription:
Show Siege Golems on the big map

**Default**: `false`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

CastleRelocationEnabled.markdownDescription:
Enables or disables castle relocation

**Default**: `true`

**Range**: `true` or `false`

InactivityKillTimeMin.markdownDescription:
Minimum timer before inactive player is killed in seconds based on gear level

**Default**: `3600` (1 hour)

**Minimum**: `0`

InactivityKillTimeMax.markdownDescription:
Maximum timer before inactive player is killed in seconds based on gear level

**Default**: `604800` (7 days)

**Range**: `60`-`604800`

InactivityKillSafeTimeAddition.markdownDescription:
Additional time before an inactive player is killed when in a castle territory

**Default**: `172800` (2 days)

**Range**: `0`-`604800`

InactivityKillTimerMaxItemLevel.markdownDescription:
The maximum gear level that the inactivity min and max timers are based on

**Default**: `84`

**Range**: `1`-`100`

DisableDisconnectedDeadTimer.markdownDescription:
The time for a disconnected dead player to become disabled in seconds

**Default**: `60`

**Minimum**: `0`

DisconnectedSunImmunityTime.markdownDescription:
Time in seconds a disconnected player has immunity from sun damage (undocumented)

**Default**: `300.0` (5 minutes)

**Minimum**: `0`

CastleSiegeTimer.markdownDescription:
Duration in seconds that a castle siege can last

**Default**: `420.0` (7 minutes)

**Range**: `1`-`1800`

CastleUnderAttackTimer.markdownDescription:
Duration in seconds for enemy players that deal damage to heart, use explosives or siege golems

**Default**: `60.0`

**Range**: `1`-`180`

CastleRaidTimer.markdownDescription:
Duration of a castle raid in seconds

**Default**: `600.0` (10 minutes)

**Range**: `0`-`3600`

CastleRaidProtectionTime.markdownDescription:
Cooldown between castle raids in seconds

**Default**: `1800.0` (30 minutes)

**Range**: `0`-`86400`

CastleExposedFreeClaimTimer.markdownDescription:
Duration in seconds a castle is exposed for claiming

**Default**: `300.0` (5 minutes)

CastleRelocationCooldown.markdownDescription:
Cooldown time in seconds for castle relocation

**Default**: `10800.0` (3 hours)

**Range**: `0`-`172800`

StartingProgressionLevel.markdownDescription:
All quests below this number will be unlocked for players

**Default**: `0`

**Minimum**: `0`

StarterEquipmentId.markdownDescription:
ID for starting equipment set:
- `0`: None
- `-376135143`: Copper Equipment (Lvl 30)
- `-1613823352`: Iron Equipment (Lvl 50)
- `-255898606`: Darksilver Equipment (Lvl 70)
- `1177675846`: Sanguine Equipment (Lvl 80)

**Default**: `0`

StarterResourcesId.markdownDescription:
ID for starting resources:
- `0`: None
- `-696202180`: Copper Material (Lvl 30)
- `481718792`: Iron Material (Lvl 50)
- `-766909665`: Darksilver Material (Lvl 70)

**Default**: `0`

InventoryStacksModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of items that can be combined into a single stack

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`5.0`

DropTableModifier_General.markdownDescription:
Multiplies all droptables with this factor granting more or less drops from kills and chests

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`5.0`

DropTableModifier_Missions.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of loot received from successful servant hunts

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`5.0`

MaterialYieldModifier_Global.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of materials received from harvesting resource nodes

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`5.0`

BloodEssenceYieldModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of blood essence received from defeating enemies

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`5.0`

PvPVampireRespawnModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the additional respawn duration players suffer from being slain in PvP

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

BuildCostModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of materials required to build structures

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`10`

RecipeCostModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the cost of crafting items

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`10`

CraftRateModifier.markdownDescription:
The rate for crafting items and equipment in crafting stations (not refinement stations). Higher rate results in more rapid crafting

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`10`

RefinementCostModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the cost of refining items

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`10`

RefinementRateModifier.markdownDescription:
Rate for how quickly materials are refined. A higher rate results in more rapid refinement

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`10`

DismantleResourceModifier.markdownDescription:
The material reimbursement players receive from dismantling a structure

**Default**: `0.75`

**Range**: `0`-`1`

ServantConvertRateModifier.markdownDescription:
Rate for how quickly humans turn into servants. A higher rate results in more rapid conversion

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`20`

Death_DurabilityFactorLoss.markdownDescription:
The amount of durability loss that equipment suffers upon death when defeated in PvP. Players are deemed as in PvP for a duration after dealing damage to or receiving damage from another player

**Default**: `0.25`

**Range**: `0`-`1`

Death_DurabilityLossFactorAsResources.markdownDescription:
Durability loss suffered upon death is dropped as materials. This value defines the amount of materials that are either lost or dropped:
- `0`: All materials are lost
- `1`: All materials are dropped

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`1`

BloodDrainModifier.markdownDescription:
Rate for how quickly players lose blood. A higher rate results in higher blood consumption

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

DurabilityDrainModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of durability suffered from dealing or receiving damage

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

GarlicAreaStrengthModifier.markdownDescription:
Affects the rate of how quickly garlic stacks when exposed

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

HolyAreaStrengthModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the effect of the Holy element

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

SilverStrengthModifier.markdownDescription:
Affects the damage received when carrying silver items

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

SunDamageModifier.markdownDescription:
Affects the duration a player may stand in the sun before starting to take damage

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

CastleDecayRateModifier.markdownDescription:
Rate for how quickly a castle deteriorates when the castle heart has run out of Blood Essence

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0`-`5`

CastleBloodEssenceDrainModifier.markdownDescription:
Rate for how quickly a castle consumes blood essence. A higher rate results in higher blood essence consumption

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

CastleMinimumDistanceInFloors.markdownDescription:
The number of minimum tiles where players can place a castle heart and/or floors next to another heart

**Default**: `2`

**Range**: `1`-`10`

ClanSize.markdownDescription:
The number of players that can join a single clan. Players in a clan can rise together, share progress and build castles together

**Default**: `4`

**Range**: `1`-`20`

MaxHealthModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the maximum amount of health

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

MaxEnergyModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the maximum amount of energy

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

PhysicalPowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies physical power, this value affects the amount of damage players deal using weapon attacks and weapon skills

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

SpellPowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies spell power, this value affects the amount of damage and healing players deal using spells

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

ResourcePowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of damage players deal to resource objects

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

ReviveCancelDelay.markdownDescription:
Delay before revival can be cancelled (Do not change)

**Default**: `5.0`

MaxHealthModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of health for regular units

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

PowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the damage output for regular units

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

LevelIncrease.markdownDescription:
Increases the level of all regular units

**Default**: `0`

MaxHealthModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the amount of health for V Blood bosses

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

PowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the damage output for V Blood bosses

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.1`-`5`

LevelIncrease.markdownDescription:
Increases the level of all V Blood bosses

**Default**: `0`

ResourceYieldModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies the materials received from harvesting resources

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`3`

PhysicalPowerModifier.markdownDescription:
Multiplies physical attack power from equipment

**Default**: `1.0`

**Range**: `0.25`-`3`

DayDurationInSeconds.markdownDescription:
The duration of an ingame day in seconds

**Default**: `1080.0` (18 minutes)

**Range**: `60`-`86400`

DayStartHour.markdownDescription:
The starting hour of the ingame day

**Default**: `9`

**Range**: `0`-`23`

DayStartMinute.markdownDescription:
The starting minute of the ingame day

**Default**: `0`

**Range**: `0`-`59`

DayEndHour.markdownDescription:
The end hour of the ingame day

**Default**: `17`

**Range**: `0`-`23`

DayEndMinute.markdownDescription:
The end minute of the ingame day

**Default**: `0`

**Range**: `0`-`59`

BloodMoonFrequency_Min.markdownDescription:
The minimum frequency for how often a blood moon may occur (in days)

**Default**: `10`

**Range**: `1`-`255`

BloodMoonFrequency_Max.markdownDescription:
The maximum frequency for how often a blood moon may occur (in days)

**Default**: `18`

**Range**: `1`-`255`

BloodMoonBuff.markdownDescription:
The amount of additional movement speed in % that a player gains during blood moon

**Default**: `0.2` (20%)

**Range**: `0.1`-`1`

TickPeriod.markdownDescription:
How often the castle decay damage should tick (in seconds)

**Default**: `5.0`

**Range**: `1`-`60`

DamageResistance.markdownDescription:
Base damage resistance for castle structures (Not currently used)

**Default**: `0.0`

SafetyBoxLimit.markdownDescription:
The number of vampire lockboxes players may build in a single castle

**Default**: `1`

**Range**: `0`-`20`

TombLimit.markdownDescription:
The number of tombs players may build in a single castle

**Default**: `12`

**Range**: `1`-`50`

VerminNestLimit.markdownDescription:
The number of vermin nests players may build in a single castle

**Default**: `4`

**Range**: `0`-`20`

PrisonCellLimit.markdownDescription:
The number of prison cells allowed in a single castle

**Default**: `16`

**Range**: `0`-`50`

CastleLimit.markdownDescription:
The number of castle hearts a single player is allowed to construct

**Default**: `2`

**Range**: `1`-`10`

NetherGateLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of Nether Gates allowed per castle

**Default**: `1`

**Range**: `0`-`10`

ThroneOfDarknessLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of Thrones of Darkness allowed per castle

**Default**: `1`

**Range**: `0`-`10`

FloorLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum floor tiles for Level 1 castle

**Default**: `50`

**Minimum**: `9`, **Maximum**: `800`

HeightLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum building height for Level 1 castle

**Default**: `3`

FloorLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum floor tiles for Level 2 castle

**Default**: `140`

**Minimum**: `9`, **Maximum**: `800`

HeightLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum building height for Level 2 castle

**Default**: `3`

FloorLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum floor tiles for Level 3 castle

**Default**: `240`

**Minimum**: `9`, **Maximum**: `800`

HeightLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum building height for Level 3 castle

**Default**: `3`

FloorLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum floor tiles for Level 4 castle

**Default**: `360`

**Minimum**: `9`, **Maximum**: `800`

HeightLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum building height for Level 4 castle

**Default**: `3`

FloorLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum floor tiles for Level 5 castle

**Default**: `550`

**Minimum**: `9`, **Maximum**: `800`

HeightLimit.markdownDescription:
Maximum building height for Level 5 castle

**Default**: `3`

TimeZone.markdownDescription:
Time zone for PvP and siege windows:
- `Local`: Local System Time
- `UTC`: UTC
- `PST`: Pacific Standard Time (UTC -8)
- `EST`: Eastern Standard Time (UTC -5)
- `CET`: Central European Time (UTC +1)
- `CST`: China Standard Time (UTC +8)

**Default**: `UTC`

StartHour.markdownDescription:
The real time starting hour for PvP during weekdays

**Default**: `17`

StartMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time starting minute for PvP during weekdays

**Default**: `0`

EndHour.markdownDescription:
The real time ending hour for PvP during weekdays

**Default**: `23`

EndMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time ending minute for PvP during weekdays

**Default**: `0`

StartHour.markdownDescription:
The real time starting hour for PvP during weekends

**Default**: `17`

StartMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time starting minute for PvP during weekends

**Default**: `0`

EndHour.markdownDescription:
The real time ending hour for PvP during weekends

**Default**: `23`

EndMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time ending minute for PvP during weekends

**Default**: `0`

StartHour.markdownDescription:
The real time starting hour for castle sieges during weekdays

**Default**: `17`

StartMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time starting minute for castle sieges during weekdays

**Default**: `0`

EndHour.markdownDescription:
The real time ending hour for castle sieges during weekdays

**Default**: `23`

EndMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time ending minute for castle sieges during weekdays

**Default**: `0`

StartHour.markdownDescription:
The real time starting hour for castle sieges during weekends

**Default**: `17`

StartMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time starting minute for castle sieges during weekends

**Default**: `0`

EndHour.markdownDescription:
The real time ending hour for castle sieges during weekends

**Default**: `23`

EndMinute.markdownDescription:
The real time ending minute for castle sieges during weekends

**Default**: `0`
